  checkmate::assert_list(datasets, types = "FilteredData", any.missing = FALSE, names = "named")

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    9x

                    
                      
  checkmate::assert_true(is.reactive(snapshot_history))

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    9x

                    
                      
  checkmate::assert_list(isolate(snapshot_history()), names = "unique")

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    9x

                    
                      
  moduleServer(id, function(input, output, session) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    9x

                    
                      
    logger::log_trace("bookmark_manager_srv initializing")

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
    # Set up bookmarking callbacks.

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    9x

                    
                      
    app_session <- .subset2(shiny::getDefaultReactiveDomain(), "parent")

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
    # Register bookmark exclusions: all buttons and the `textInput` for bookmark name.

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
    # Run in observer so list is updated every time new input item is registered.

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    9x

                    
                      
    observe({

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    79x

                    
                      
      inputs <- reactiveValuesToList(app_session$input)

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    79x

                    
                      
      ids_buttons <- names(Filter(function(x) inherits(x, "shinyActionButtonValue"), inputs))

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    79x

                    
                      
      id_bookmark_name <- grep("bookmark_name", names(inputs), value = TRUE, fixed = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    79x

                    
                      
      setBookmarkExclude(union(ids_buttons, id_bookmark_name), session = app_session)

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
    })

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    9x

                    
                      
    app_session$onBookmark(function(state) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
      # Add current filter state to bookmark.

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    !
                    
                      
      logger::log_trace("bookmark_manager_srv@onBookmark: storing filter state")

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    !
                    
                      
      snapshot <- as.list(slices_global(), recursive = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    !
                    
                      
      attr(snapshot, "mapping") <- matrix_to_mapping(mapping_matrix())

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    !
                    
                      
      state$values$filter_state_on_bookmark <- snapshot

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
      # Add snapshot history and bookmark history to bookmark.

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    !
                    
                      
      logger::log_trace("bookmark_manager_srv@onBookmark: storing snapshot and bookmark history")

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    !
                    
                      
      state$values$snapshot_history <- snapshot_history() # isolate this?

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    !
                    
                      
      state$values$bookmark_history <- bookmark_history() # isolate this?

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
    })

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    9x

                    
                      
    app_session$onBookmarked(function(url) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    !
                    
                      
      logger::log_trace("bookmark_manager_srv@onBookmarked: bookmark button clicked, registering bookmark")

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    !
                    
                      
      bookmark_name <- trimws(input$bookmark_name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    !
                    
                      
      if (identical(bookmark_name, "")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    !
                    
                      
        logger::log_trace("bookmark_manager_srv@onBookmarked: bookmark name rejected")

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    !
                    
                      
        showNotification(

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    !
                    
                      
          "Please name the bookmark.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    !
                    
                      
          type = "message"

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    !
                    
                      
        updateTextInput(inputId = "bookmark_name", value = "", placeholder = "Meaningful, unique name")

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    !
                    
                      
        unlink(strsplit(url, "_state_id_=")[[1L]][[2L]], recursive = TRUE, force = TRUE, expand = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    !
                    
                      
      } else if (is.element(make.names(bookmark_name), make.names(names(bookmark_history())))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    !
                    
                      
        logger::log_trace("bookmark_manager_srv@onBookmarked: bookmark name rejected")

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    !
                    
                      
        showNotification(

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    !
                    
                      
          "This name is in conflict with other bookmark names. Please choose a different one.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    !
                    
                      
          type = "message"

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    !
                    
                      
        updateTextInput(inputId = "bookmark_name", value = "", placeholder = "Meaningful, unique name")

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    !
                    
                      
        unlink(strsplit(url, "_state_id_=")[[1L]][[2L]], recursive = TRUE, force = TRUE, expand = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
        # Add bookmark URL to bookmark history (with name).

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    !
                    
                      
        logger::log_trace("bookmark_manager_srv@onBookmarked: bookmark name accepted, adding to history")

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    !
                    
                      
        bookmark_update <- c(bookmark_history(), list(url))

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    !
                    
                      
        names(bookmark_update)[length(bookmark_update)] <- bookmark_name

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    !
                    
                      
        bookmark_history(bookmark_update)

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    !
                    
                      
        removeModal()

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
    })

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    9x

                    
                      
    app_session$onRestored(function(state) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
      # Restore filter state.

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    !
                    
                      
      logger::log_trace("bookmark_manager_srv@onRestored: restoring filter state")

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    !
                    
                      
      snapshot <- state$values$filter_state_on_bookmark

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    !
                    
                      
      snapshot_state <- as.teal_slices(snapshot)

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    !
                    
                      
      mapping_unfolded <- unfold_mapping(attr(snapshot_state, "mapping"), names(datasets))

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    !
                    
                      
      mapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    !
                    
                      
        function(filtered_data, filter_ids) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    !
                    
                      
          filtered_data$clear_filter_states(force = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    !
                    
                      
          slices <- Filter(function(x) x$id %in% filter_ids, snapshot_state)

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    !
                    
                      
          filtered_data$set_filter_state(slices)

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
        },

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    !
                    
                      
        filtered_data = datasets,

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    !
                    
                      
        filter_ids = mapping_unfolded

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    !
                    
                      
      slices_global(snapshot_state)

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
      # Restore snapshot history and bookmark history.

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    !
                    
                      
      logger::log_trace("bookmark_manager_srv@onRestored: restoring snapshot and bookmark history")

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    !
                    
                      
      snapshot_history(state$values$snapshot_history)

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    !
                    
                      
      bookmark_history(state$values$bookmark_history)

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
    })

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    9x

                    
                      
    ns <- session$ns

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
    # Store input states.

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    9x

                    
                      
    bookmark_history <- reactiveVal({

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    9x

                    
                      
      list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
    })

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
    # Bookmark current input state - name bookmark.

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    9x

                    
                      
    observeEvent(input$bookmark_add, {

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    !
                    
                      
      logger::log_trace("bookmark_manager_srv: bookmark_add button clicked")

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    !
                    
                      
      showModal(

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    !
                    
                      
        modalDialog(

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    !
                    
                      
          textInput(ns("bookmark_name"), "Name the bookmark", width = "100%", placeholder = "Meaningful, unique name"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    !
                    
                      
          footer = tagList(

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    !
                    
                      
            actionButton(ns("bookmark_accept"), label = "Accept", icon = icon("thumbs-up")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    !
                    
                      
            modalButton(label = "Cancel", icon = icon("thumbs-down"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
          ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    !
                    
                      
          size = "s"

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
    })

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
    # Initiate bookmarking with normal action button b/c `bookmarkButton` may not work on Windows.

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    9x

                    
                      
    observeEvent(input$bookmark_accept, {

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    !
                    
                      
      app_session$doBookmark()

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
    })

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
    # Create UI elements and server logic for the bookmark table.

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
    # Divs are tracked for a slight speed margin.

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    9x

                    
                      
    divs <- reactiveValues()

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    9x

                    
                      
    observeEvent(bookmark_history(), {

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    7x

                    
                      
      logger::log_trace("bookmark_manager_srv: bookmark history changed, updating bookmark list")

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    7x

                    
                      
      lapply(names(bookmark_history()), function(s) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    !
                    
                      
        id_rowme <- sprintf("rowme_%s", make.names(s))

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
        # Create a row for the bookmark table.

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    !
                    
                      
        if (!is.element(id_rowme, names(divs))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    !
                    
                      
          divs[[id_rowme]] <- div(

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    !
                    
                      
            class = "manager_table_row",

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    !
                    
                      
            a(h5(s), title = "go to bookmark", href = bookmark_history()[[s]], target = "blank")

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
          )

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
      })

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
    })

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
    # Create table to display list of bookmarks and their actions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    9x

                    
                      
    output$bookmark_list <- renderUI({

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    2x

                    
                      
      rows <- lapply(rev(reactiveValuesToList(divs)), function(d) d)

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    2x

                    
                      
      if (length(rows) == 0L) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    2x

                    
                      
        div(

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    2x

                    
                      
          class = "manager_placeholder",

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    2x

                    
                      
          "Bookmarks will appear here."

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    !
                    
                      
        rows

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
    })

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    9x

                    
                      
    bookmark_history

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
  })

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
.onLoad <- function(libname, pkgname) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
  # adapted from https://github.com/r-lib/devtools/blob/master/R/zzz.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    !
                    
                      
  teal_default_options <- list(teal.show_js_log = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    !
                    
                      
  op <- options()

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    !
                    
                      
  toset <- !(names(teal_default_options) %in% names(op))

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    !
                    
                      
  if (any(toset)) options(teal_default_options[toset])

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    !
                    
                      
  options("shiny.sanitize.errors" = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
  # Set up the teal logger instance

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    !
                    
                      
  teal.logger::register_logger("teal")

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    !
                    
                      
  teal.logger::register_handlers("teal")

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
  # Turn on server-side bookmarking in shiny.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    !
                    
                      
  shiny::shinyOptions("bookmarkStore" = "server")

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    !
                    
                      
  invisible()

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
.onAttach <- function(libname, pkgname) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    7x

                    
                      
  packageStartupMessage(

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    7x

                    
                      
    "\nYou are using teal version ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
    # `system.file` uses the `shim` of `system.file` by `teal`

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
    # we avoid `desc` dependency here to get the version

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    7x

                    
                      
    read.dcf(system.file("DESCRIPTION", package = "teal"))[, "Version"]

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
}

# This one is here because setdiff_teal_slice should not be exported from teal.slice.

RcodeBlock <- getFromNamespace("RcodeBlock", "teal.reporter") # nolint: object_name.

lang2calls <- getFromNamespace("lang2calls", "teal.code")

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Generates library calls from current session info

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Function to create multiple library calls out of current session info to ensure reproducible code works.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Character vector of `library(<package>)` calls.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
get_rcode_libraries <- function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    17x

                    
                      
  vapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    17x

                    
                      
    utils::sessionInfo()$otherPkgs,

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    17x

                    
                      
    function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    114x

                    
                      
      paste0("library(", x$Package, ")")

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    17x

                    
                      
    character(1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
  ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
    # put it into reverse order to correctly simulate executed code

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    17x

                    
                      
    rev() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    17x

                    
                      
    paste0(sep = "\n") %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    17x

                    
                      
    paste0(collapse = "")

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
get_rcode_str_install <- function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    21x

                    
                      
  code_string <- getOption("teal.load_nest_code")

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    21x

                    
                      
  if (is.character(code_string)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    2x

                    
                      
    code_string

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    19x

                    
                      
    "# Add any code to install/load your NEST environment here\n"

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' Get datasets code

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve complete code to create, verify, and filter a dataset.

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' @param datanames (`character`) names of datasets to extract code from

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @param datasets (`FilteredData`) object

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' @param hashes named (`list`) of hashes per dataset

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Character string concatenated from the following elements:

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'  - data pre-processing code (from `data` argument in `init`)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'  - hash check of loaded objects

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'  - filter code (if any)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
get_datasets_code <- function(datanames, datasets, hashes) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
  # preprocessing code

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    15x

                    
                      
  str_prepro <- attr(datasets, "preprocessing_code")

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    15x

                    
                      
  if (length(str_prepro) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    !
                    
                      
    str_prepro <- "message('Preprocessing is empty')"

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    15x

                    
                      
    str_prepro <- paste(str_prepro, collapse = "\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
  # hash checks

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    15x

                    
                      
  str_hash <- vapply(datanames, function(dataname) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    28x

                    
                      
    sprintf(

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    28x

                    
                      
      "stopifnot(%s == %s)",

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    28x

                    
                      
      deparse1(bquote(rlang::hash(.(as.name(dataname))))),

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    28x

                    
                      
      deparse1(hashes[[dataname]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    15x

                    
                      
  }, character(1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    15x

                    
                      
  str_hash <- paste(str_hash, collapse = "\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
  # filter expressions

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    15x

                    
                      
  str_filter <- teal.slice::get_filter_expr(datasets, datanames)

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    15x

                    
                      
  if (str_filter == "") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    10x

                    
                      
    str_filter <- character(0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
  # concatenate all code

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    15x

                    
                      
  str_code <- paste(c(str_prepro, str_hash, str_filter), collapse = "\n\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    15x

                    
                      
  sprintf("%s\n", str_code)

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Create a UI of nested tabs of `teal_modules`

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @section `ui_nested_tabs`:

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Each `teal_modules` is translated to a `tabsetPanel` and each

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' of its children is another tab-module called recursively. The UI of a

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' `teal_module` is obtained by calling its UI function.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' The `datasets` argument is required to resolve the `teal` arguments in an

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' isolated context (with respect to reactivity).

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @section `srv_nested_tabs`:

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' This module recursively calls all elements of `modules` and returns currently active one.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' - `teal_module` returns self as a active module.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' - `teal_modules` also returns module active within self which is determined by the `input$active_tab`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @name module_nested_tabs

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams module_tabs_with_filters

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @param depth (`integer(1)`)

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'  number which helps to determine depth of the modules nesting.

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @param is_module_specific (`logical(1)`)

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'  flag determining if the filter panel is global or module-specific.

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'  When set to `TRUE`, a filter panel is called inside of each module tab.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @return

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' Depending on the class of `modules`, `ui_nested_tabs` returns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   - `teal_module`: instantiated UI of the module.

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'   - `teal_modules`: `tabsetPanel` with each tab corresponding to recursively

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'     calling this function on it.

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' `srv_nested_tabs` returns a reactive which returns the active module that corresponds to the selected tab.

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname module_nested_tabs

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
ui_nested_tabs <- function(id, modules, datasets, depth = 0L, is_module_specific = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    10x

                    
                      
  checkmate::assert_multi_class(modules, c("teal_modules", "teal_module"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    10x

                    
                      
  checkmate::assert_count(depth)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    10x

                    
                      
  UseMethod("ui_nested_tabs", modules)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname module_nested_tabs

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
ui_nested_tabs.default <- function(id, modules, datasets, depth = 0L, is_module_specific = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    !
                    
                      
  stop("Modules class not supported: ", paste(class(modules), collapse = " "))

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname module_nested_tabs

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
ui_nested_tabs.teal_modules <- function(id, modules, datasets, depth = 0L, is_module_specific = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    5x

                    
                      
  checkmate::assert_list(datasets, types = c("list", "FilteredData"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    5x

                    
                      
  ns <- NS(id)

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    5x

                    
                      
  do.call(

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    5x

                    
                      
    tabsetPanel,

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    5x

                    
                      
    c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
      # by giving an id, we can reactively respond to tab changes

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    5x

                    
                      
      list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    5x

                    
                      
        id = ns("active_tab"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    5x

                    
                      
        type = if (modules$label == "root") "pills" else "tabs"

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    5x

                    
                      
      lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    5x

                    
                      
        names(modules$children),

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    5x

                    
                      
        function(module_id) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    5x

                    
                      
          module_label <- modules$children[[module_id]]$label

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    5x

                    
                      
          tabPanel(

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    5x

                    
                      
            title = module_label,

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    5x

                    
                      
            value = module_id, # when clicked this tab value changes input$<tabset panel id>

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    5x

                    
                      
            ui_nested_tabs(

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    5x

                    
                      
              id = ns(module_id),

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    5x

                    
                      
              modules = modules$children[[module_id]],

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    5x

                    
                      
              datasets = datasets[[module_label]],

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    5x

                    
                      
              depth = depth + 1L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    5x

                    
                      
              is_module_specific = is_module_specific

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
            )

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
          )

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname module_nested_tabs

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
ui_nested_tabs.teal_module <- function(id, modules, datasets, depth = 0L, is_module_specific = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    5x

                    
                      
  checkmate::assert_class(datasets, classes = "FilteredData")

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    5x

                    
                      
  ns <- NS(id)

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    5x

                    
                      
  args <- c(list(id = ns("module")), modules$ui_args)

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    5x

                    
                      
  teal_ui <- tags$div(

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    5x

                    
                      
    id = id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    5x

                    
                      
    class = "teal_module",

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    5x

                    
                      
    uiOutput(ns("data_reactive"), inline = TRUE),

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    5x

                    
                      
    tagList(

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    5x

                    
                      
      if (depth >= 2L) tags$div(style = "mt-6"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    5x

                    
                      
      do.call(modules$ui, args)

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    5x

                    
                      
  if (!is.null(modules$datanames) && is_module_specific) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    !
                    
                      
    fluidRow(

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    !
                    
                      
      column(width = 9, teal_ui, class = "teal_primary_col"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    !
                    
                      
      column(

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    !
                    
                      
        width = 3,

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    !
                    
                      
        datasets$ui_filter_panel(ns("module_filter_panel")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    !
                    
                      
        class = "teal_secondary_col"

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    5x

                    
                      
    teal_ui

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname module_nested_tabs

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
srv_nested_tabs <- function(id, datasets, modules, is_module_specific = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
                            reporter = teal.reporter::Reporter$new()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    119

  checkmate::assert_multi_class(modules, c("teal_modules", "teal_module"))

srv_nested_tabs.default <- function(id, datasets, modules, is_module_specific = FALSE,

                                    reporter = teal.reporter::Reporter$new()) {

#' @rdname module_nested_tabs

srv_nested_tabs.teal_modules <- function(id, datasets, modules, is_module_specific = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
                                         reporter = teal.reporter::Reporter$new()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    27x

                    
                      
  checkmate::assert_list(datasets, types = c("list", "FilteredData"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    27x

                    
                      
  moduleServer(id = id, module = function(input, output, session) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    27x

                    
                      
    logger::log_trace("srv_nested_tabs.teal_modules initializing the module { deparse1(modules$label) }.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    27x

                    
                      
    labels <- vapply(modules$children, `[[`, character(1), "label")

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    27x

                    
                      
    modules_reactive <- sapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    27x

                    
                      
      names(modules$children),

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    27x

                    
                      
      function(module_id) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    38x

                    
                      
        srv_nested_tabs(

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    38x

                    
                      
          id = module_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    38x

                    
                      
          datasets = datasets[[labels[module_id]]],

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    38x

                    
                      
          modules = modules$children[[module_id]],

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    38x

                    
                      
          is_module_specific = is_module_specific,

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    38x

                    
                      
          reporter = reporter

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
      },

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    27x

                    
                      
      simplify = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
    # when not ready input$active_tab would return NULL - this would fail next reactive

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    27x

                    
                      
    input_validated <- eventReactive(input$active_tab, input$active_tab, ignoreNULL = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    27x

                    
                      
    get_active_module <- reactive({

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    17x

                    
                      
      if (length(modules$children) == 1L) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
        # single tab is active by default

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    6x

                    
                      
        modules_reactive[[1]]()

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
        # switch to active tab

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    11x

                    
                      
        modules_reactive[[input_validated()]]()

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
    })

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    27x

                    
                      
    get_active_module

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
  })

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname module_nested_tabs

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
srv_nested_tabs.teal_module <- function(id, datasets, modules, is_module_specific = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
                                        reporter = teal.reporter::Reporter$new()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    32x

                    
                      
  checkmate::assert_class(datasets, "FilteredData")

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    32x

                    
                      
  logger::log_trace("srv_nested_tabs.teal_module initializing the module: { deparse1(modules$label) }.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    32x

                    
                      
  moduleServer(id = id, module = function(input, output, session) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    32x

                    
                      
    if (!is.null(modules$datanames) && is_module_specific) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    !
                    
                      
      datasets$srv_filter_panel("module_filter_panel")

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
    # Create two triggers to limit reactivity between filter-panel and modules.

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
    # We want to recalculate only visible modules

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
    # - trigger the data when the tab is selected

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
